attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prevent the payment by the BBC of £30,000 compensation to the Muslim Council of Britain. Following a recent BBC edition of question time the Muslim Council of Britain was a bit offended to be associated with terrorism. They have suffered no financial loss and should receive no financial gain from license payers money.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
